Export.Routine:
#include COMSYS #include VARConst #include INConst #include VARSESConst
VARAlertaLocalBIZ quit
CriarOrdemCompra(&parrAlertaLinhas, &parrDocs) new strStatus, arrDocs
set strStatus = $$Transaction^COMTransaction("CriarOrdemCompraTxn^VARAlertaLocalBIZ(.parrAlertaLinhas,.parrDocs)", $$$YES)
quit strStatus
CriarPedidoCompra(&parrAlertaLinhas, &parrDocs) new strStatus, arrDocs
set strStatus = $$Transaction^COMTransaction("CriarPedidoCompraTxn^VARAlertaLocalBIZ(.parrAlertaLinhas,.parrDocs)", $$$YES)
quit strStatus
CriarRequisicao(&parrAlertaLinhas, &parrDocs) new strStatus, arrDocs
set strStatus = $$Transaction^COMTransaction("CriarRequisicaoTxn^VARAlertaLocalBIZ(.parrAlertaLinhas,.parrDocs)", $$$YES)
quit strStatus
CriarOrdemCompraTxn(&parrAlertaLinhas,&pListOfDocs)
new objCompra, idCompra, strStatus, idItem, idLocation, objCompraLinha, fltQuantity, parrPurchases
set strStatus = $$$OK $$$Order1(parrAlertaLinhas,Location) set idLocation=Location $$$Order2(parrAlertaLinhas,Location,idItem)
set fltQuantity = parrAlertaLinhas(Location, idItem)
set parrPurchases(idItem, Location) = fltQuantity
$$$End $$$End set objCompra = "" set $piece(objCompra,Y,6)=idLocation set $piece(objCompra,Y,2)=2 set $piece(objCompra,Y,348)=0
set idCompra = $$^WWWNEXT("INAUF") if (idCompra = "") { quit "0~Erro ao criar Ordem de Compra" } set pListOfDocs("Purchase",idCompra)="" set strStatus = $$$Save("INAUF",idCompra,objCompra,1) if (strStatus '= $$$OK) { quit strStatus // if error, quit. }
// Agora, cria as linhas da PAM: // setar os campos 1,54; 2,55; 4,56; 16,57; set intCounter = 1 $$$Order1(parrPurchases,idItem)
$$$Order2(parrPurchases,idItem,idLocation)
set objCompraLinha = "" set fltQuantity = parrPurchases(idItem, idLocation) set $piece(objCompraLinha,Y,1)=$piece(^INART(YM,idItem,1),Y,1) set $piece(objCompraLinha,Y,4)=idItem set $piece(objCompraLinha,Y,5)=fltQuantity set $piece(objCompraLinha,Y,448)=fltQuantity //Why twice? set $piece(objCompraLinha,Y,292)=1 //Do we need this? set $piece(objCompraLinha,Y,7)=1 //Do we need this? set $piece(objCompraLinha,Y,12)="" //No supplier at this time - CHECK THIS LATER set $piece(objCompraLinha,Y,40)=$piece(^INART(YM,idItem,1),Y,40) set $piece(objCompraLinha,Y,449)=$piece(^INART(YM,idItem,1),Y,40) //Why twice?
set strStatus = $$$Save("INAUFP",idCompra_$$$COMMA_intCounter,objCompraLinha,1) set intCounter = intCounter + 1 do:'$$$ISOK(strStatus) RaiseError(strStatus) $$$End $$$End
quit strStatus
CriarRequisicaoTxn(&parrAlertaLinhas,&pListOfDocs)
new objReq, idTransfer, strStatus, idItem, idLocation, objReqLinha, fltQuantity, parrPurchases
set strStatus = $$$OK $$$Order1(parrAlertaLinhas,Location) set idLocation=Location $$$Order2(parrAlertaLinhas,Location,idItem)
set fltQuantity = parrAlertaLinhas(Location, idItem)
set parrReqs(idItem, Location) = fltQuantity
$$$End $$$End
set objReq = ""
set $piece(objReq,Y,1)=1 set $piece(objReq,Y,2)=$piece($H,",",1) set $piece(objReq,Y,3)=idLocation set $piece(objReq,Y,4)="" set $piece(objReq,Y,7)=2 //Tipo de requisição
set idTransfer = $$^WWWNEXT("INReq") if (idTransfer = "") { quit "0~Erro ao criar requisição" } set pListOfDocs("Requisition",idTransfer)="" set strStatus = $$$Save("INReq",idTransfer,objReq,1) if (strStatus '= $$$OK) { quit strStatus // if error, quit. }
set intCounter = 1 $$$Order1(parrReqs,idItem)
$$$Order2(parrReqs,idItem,idLocation)
set objReqLinha = "" set fltQuantity = parrReqs(idItem, idLocation) set $piece(objReqLinha,Y,1)=idItem set $piece(objReqLinha,Y,2)=$piece(^INART(YM,idItem,1),Y,40) set $piece(objReqLinha,Y,3)=fltQuantity set $piece(objReqLinha,Y,4)=fltQuantity
//set $piece(objReqLinha,Y,9)= //Local abastecedor não pode ser salvo pois ainda não foi definido set $piece(objReqLinha,Y,10)=1 //Status //set $piece(objReqLinha,Y,12)=fltQuantity //Consumo Mensal //set $piece(objReqLinha,Y,31)=fltQuantity //Preço Unitário
set strStatus = $$$Save("INReqLine",idTransfer_$$$COMMA_intCounter,objReqLinha,1) set intCounter = intCounter + 1 do:'$$$ISOK(strStatus) RaiseError(strStatus) $$$End $$$End
quit strStatus
CriarPedidoCompraTxn(&parrAlertaLinhas,&pListOfDocs)
new objCompra, idCompra, strStatus, idItem, idLocation, objCompraLinha, fltQuantity, parrPurchases
set strStatus = $$$OK $$$Order1(parrAlertaLinhas,Location) set idLocation=Location $$$Order2(parrAlertaLinhas,Location,idItem)
set fltQuantity = parrAlertaLinhas(Location, idItem)
set parrPurchases(idItem, Location) = fltQuantity
$$$End $$$End set objCompra = "" set $piece(objCompra,Y,3)=idLocation set $piece(objCompra,Y,6)=0 set $piece(objCompra,Y,8)=$piece($H,",",1) set $piece(objCompra,Y,9)=YBED
set idCompra = $$^WWWNEXT("VARPedidoCompra") if (idCompra = "") { quit "0~Erro ao criar Pedido de Compra" } set pListOfDocs("PurchaseRequest",idCompra)="" set strStatus = $$$Save("VARPedidoCompra",idCompra,objCompra,1) if (strStatus '= $$$OK) { quit strStatus // if error, quit. }
set intCounter = 1 $$$Order1(parrPurchases,idItem)
$$$Order2(parrPurchases,idItem,idLocation)
set objCompraLinha = "" set fltQuantity = parrPurchases(idItem, idLocation) set $piece(objCompraLinha,Y,3)=$piece(^INART(YM,idItem,1),Y,30) set $piece(objCompraLinha,Y,1)=idItem set $piece(objCompraLinha,Y,4)=fltQuantity set $piece(objCompraLinha,Y,5)=0 set $piece(objCompraLinha,Y,6)=0 set $piece(objCompraLinha,Y,11)=0 set $piece(objCompraLinha,Y,2)=$piece(^INART(YM,idItem,1),Y,40)
set strStatus = $$$Save("VARPedidoCompraLinha",idCompra_$$$COMMA_intCounter,objCompraLinha,1) set intCounter = intCounter + 1 do:'$$$ISOK(strStatus) RaiseError(strStatus) $$$End $$$End
quit strStatus
RaiseError(pstrStatus)
set ^CacheTempAlertaLocalError(YBED,$horolog) = $$$Text(pstrStatus) ztrap
quit
